page.syntax: Inches as N = CmToInches(N cm [,N decimal])

argument.name: Inches
argument.description: The inch equivalent of the Centimeters value. Numeric

argument.name: cm
argument.description: The number of centimeters to convert to inches. Numeric

argument.name: decimal
argument.description: Optional. Default = 2. The number of decimal positions to return. Numeric

page.discussion: The CMTOINCHES() function converts a centimeter value to an inch value.
